channel.title: Kool-Pk NEW
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2mdmd7b.png[/img] [SIZE="7"][B][URL=http://"http://www.kool-pk.org.com"]Click Here to PLAY ![/URL][/B][/SIZE]
[u]http://kool-pk.org/[/u] [url=http://kool-pk.org/forums/index.php]http://kool-pk.org/forums/index.php[/url] [u]http://kool-pk.org/play.html[/u] [u]http://www.mediafire.com/?a74rc8qocuxeawp[/u]
Features Almost Perfect Farming Castle Wars Duel Arena /no bugs Report Abuse system WITH muting Random Events Pets Many Point systems - Slayer Points/Voting Points/Pking Points/Skiller Points + Reward Shops Full Clipping + Dancing (As in RuneScape) Fight Pits - NO DUPES Supports all major operating systems (Windows, Linux, Mac) All pvp items 8 fully working minigames to enjoy and earn rewards great economy 6 strong bosses to defeat Many places to pk
A few images [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/xl9jid.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/21otw0o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/opspbk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/11rbyj5.png[/img][/center]
